name: 韓麗龍
objective:
共射射出(Coinjection or Sandwich molding)
嵌件射出成形(Insert and outsert molding)
射出壓縮成形(Injection-compression molding)
可熔化心部射出成形(Fusible core injection molding)
雙料模塑射出(Lamellar Injection molding)
氣輔射出(Gas-assistant Injection molding)

scorePolicy:
1.上課出勤與學習態度(50%)。
2.撰寫報告(50%) 。
materials:
1. Injection Molding Handbook, Edited by Ossward/ Turng/Gramann
2. Successful Injection Molding, Edited by Beaumont/ Nagel/Sherman
